abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Museum of Modern Art updates second floor galleries with new works, including project in which artist Rirkrit Tiravanija serves visitors free vegetarian meal; exhibition of artist David Altmejd's work will open at Brant Foundation Art Study Center; BMW Guggenheim Lab, mobile lab that offers ideas for urban life, closes up its East Village location after two and a half months.
snippet: Rirkrit Tiravanija’s installation “Untitled (Free/Still)” will allow MoMA visitors to enjoy a free vegetarian curry lunch starting Nov. 17.
lead_paragraph: Rirkrit Tiravanija’s installation “Untitled (Free/Still)” will allow MoMA visitors to enjoy a free vegetarian curry lunch starting Nov. 17.

headline.main: Meals as Art at MoMA; David Altmejd at Peter Brant’s Gallery
headline.seo: Meals as Art at MoMA; David Altmejd at Peter Brant’s Gallery
